entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. A few wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain beginning late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023
